meanings.sent1: The businesses decided to cartelise to control prices.
meanings.sent2: The oil companies cartelise to manipulate the market.
meanings.sent3: The farmers cartelise to ensure fair competition.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, some companies cartelise to dominate the industry.
meanings.sent5: The decision to cartelise was crucial for their success.

meanings.definition: To organize or operate as a cartel.
meanings.sent1: The drug lords cartelise to expand their influence.
meanings.sent2: The countries cartelise to regulate trade agreements.
meanings.sent3: The students cartelise to share study materials.
meanings.sent4: The tech giants cartelise to control the market.
meanings.sent5: The criminals cartelise to increase their power.
